paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

functional_data.summary: All these mutations diminish the DSS1/BRCA2 DBD interaction, disrupting a DSS1-mediated protein assembly mechanism required for nuclear import, disabling HDR.

variants.evidence_level: strong evidence from functional assays and segregation data
variants.additional_notes: The study identifies a common molecular mechanism underlying the pathogenicity of BRCA2 missense mutations.
key_quotes: 8 of these 9 pathogenic mutations cluster within the HD and OB1 fold of the BRCA2 DBD.
We find that all these mutations diminish the DSS1/BRCA2 DBD interaction.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
